document.full_text: compensation packages for the chief executives of bailed-out firms american international group , ally financial and general motors  will not increase in 2011, the treasury department said late on friday.
document.title: aig, ally, gm ceo compensation will not increase
lines_and_colors: compensation packages for the chief executives of bailed-out firms american international group , ally financial and general motors  will not increase in 2011, the treasury department said late on friday.
